2573773 2575813 but lost the lives of two fire fighters.

2640428 2644836 Died at the hospital. Hey, you asked, man.

2687436 2692674 Yeah, well, you got to understand something, all right?
2692748 2697288 I was hoping she'd come out of it, you know.
2697357 2700171 Give me something I could work with.

2713964 2717063 I kept asking questions and...
